title: Who is 'Betty' in Taylor Swift's 'Folklore'? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can read my full explanation of the song 'Betty' in the following link : Vansh Sharma's answer to What is the meaning of the song 'Betty' by Taylor Swift? Betty, along with James and Inez are all fictional characters made by Taylor Swift. There is a fictional 'Teenage Love Triangle' storyline consisting of these 3 characters which is explored in the songs Cardigan, August and Betty. You can get more details from my answer in the above link.
Betty Boothroyd, UK parliament’s first female speaker?
